title: GRUB2 ISO boot from USB GUI menu

forumNotes.author: mitcoes
forumNotes.content:
GRUB2 can boot from ISO images.  

Unetvootbin, would have not to extract the ISO if it installs a GRUB2 menu with entries to copied ISO images.  

My AMD64 computer - I do not why - do not recognize usual commands for this feature.  

I hope if someone makes a easy GUI interface or a Unetbootbin option to include boot from ISO from USB and HDD, editing GRUB2 for the USB pendrive or the main HDD GRUB or any new GUI interface for doing it would be a great tool for multiboot installations or USB drives, like, for example katana, with ISO images instead of "installed" distros.  

Also you can have in you hdd or USB pendrive ISOs upgraded if you have any trouble.
